text: In the life cycle of a digital service, which step is the most important to make a service "green" ?
explanation: Even if all the steps are important in eco-conception, it is the design that has a major place. It is at this stage that we will think about all the rest of the life cycle, think about the functionalities, technologies, ...
tips: Take the time to design your project upstream.

text: To do web eco-conception, only developer skills are needed.
explanation: It's wrong ! SEO, accessibility and UX design are necessary for optimal eco-design.
tips: Get training on these different skills or call on a specialist.

text: Eco-conception is not only an ecological approach.
explanation: Beyond the ecological benefits, there are economic gains, time savings. We go to the essential with better performance, without superfluity, ...

text: Which stack is best suited for a static showcase website?
explanation: For a static showcase site, web standards are more than enough. It is useless to use a framework or a CMS which will be gas factories, generate/use useless functionalities, ...
tips: Analyze which technology is most suitable.

explanation: The main drawback is going to be the impact on the UI design. We will prefer a sober design rather than a design developed with animations or resource-intensive content.
tips: Use a sober design, without (too many) images, videos, 3D, ...
